learningAssessmentbody.lcIntro: This Match question attempted to test the support for mulitple lines in a Matching pair.

lcMatching2.lcQuestion2: Match the following animals to the appropriate Kingdom, Phylum, Class, Order, Family, Genus, and Species.

lcMatchingPair2.lcMatchingItem2: Kingdom: Animalia Phylum: Vertibrata Class: Mammalia Order: Carnivora Family: Canidae Genus: Canis Species: Familiaris

Kingdom: Animalia Phylum: Vertibrata Class: Amphibia Order: Anura Family: Ranidae Genus: Rana Species: Temporaria
Kingdom: Animalia Phylum: Vertibrata Class: Reptilia Order: Testudines Family: Cheloniidae Genus: Lepidochelys Species: Olivacea
Kingdom: Animalia Phylum: Vertibrata Class: Chondrichthyes Order: Lamniformes Family: Lamnidae Genus: Carcharodon Species: Carcharias
Kingdom: Animalia Phylum: Vertibrata Class: Mammalia Order: Primates Family: Hominidae Genus: Pongo Species: Pongo pygmaeus
Kingdom: Animalia Phylum: Vertibrata Class: Mammalia Order: Carnivora Family: Felidae Genus: Panthera Species: Leo
